title: Jo Stevens – 2021 Comments on Music Streaming
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Jo Stevens, the Shadow Secretary of State for Digital, Culture, Media and Sport, on 15 July 2021.
content:
When music lovers stream their favourite tracks they expect the artists who perform them to profit.
